Text.val: 20.11.2014 AS SCR#12292 Changed handling "NoAutoDecisionPossible" according to changed specs
20.11.2014 SH SCR19340 Test 5.1 Added test CVLR_REQUESTTOEULER = Y to set CVLR_MANUAL='Y' if no DRIH exists;
01.09.2014 SH SCR18917 5-6 Overdue check: Removed changes in INVO selection regarding debtor legal owner group
18.08.2014 SH SCR18917 Test 5.5 Replaced CVLR_NEWREINS_AMOUNT by CVLR_REQUESTEDLIMIT_AMOUNTH; Adde test 5.8
Debtor change blocked; 5-6 Overdue check: Changed INVO selection regarding debtor legal owner group; Added storage of CVLC if
-- 5-1: No automatic decision was possible (placed in manual queue for a EH underwriter)
-- 5-2 Limit amount < a configurable % of the requested amount?
-- 5-3 Limit amount < requested amount and the difference > a configurable amount

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO, :1/GNRL where INVO_DEBC_NO=:2 and (INVO_AACTUALC<0 or (INVO_AACTUALC>0 and days(GNRL_ACTIVEDATE)-days(INVO_DUEDATE)>:3)) and INVO_MARKCODESPEC not in (40,36,14) for fetch only
